root.description: The mist of the gate vanishes, but tree roots spring from the walls of the trench you, barring the way out.

exit.description: The [clearning] is at the top of the slope, behind the tree roots.
exit.detailedDescription: Star speckle the sky above the [clearning].

exit.description: An open [gate] stands at the end of the trench.
exit.detailedDescription: A dark void opens behind the [gate].

prop.description: [Moss] covers the walls of the trench.
prop.detailedDescription: The moss is dry and grey.

prop.description: A group of polish [tiles] are pressed into the wall need the gate.
prop.detailedDescription: At the center of the [tiles] is a small [hole].
Something small could fit inside this hole.

prop.description: A leaf of [paper] rests on the ground.
prop.detailedDescription: A note is written in Joss's hand: "To (use) and item in your (inventory) type 'use' then the item's name and then the name the thing you want to use the item on, and then hit ENTER. For example, to look a gate, a witch could type 'use stone hole'."
